description: Gets the specified playback restriction policy.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: ARN of the playback restriction policy to be returned.

nested_items.name: allowedCountries
nested_items.description: A list of country codes that control geoblocking restriction. Allowed values are the officially assigned ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes. Default: All countries (an empty array).

nested_items.name: allowedOrigins
nested_items.description: A list of origin sites that control CORS restriction. Allowed values are the same as valid values of the Origin header defined at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Origin. Default: All origins (an empty array).

nested_items.name: enableStrictOriginEnforcement
nested_items.description: Whether channel playback is constrained by origin site. Default: false.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Playback-restriction-policy name. The value does not need to be unique.
